name: Succubus Tamer 2 - White Cat Charlotte and the Hiyoko Wizard
name_original: Succubus Tamer 2 - White Cat Charlotte and the Hiyoko Wizard
description:
Squeezed a fine from men The demon that takes it and uses it as food. There was a person called Succubus Tamer who catches such a devil and plays a role and fights together.
The story begins when a guest who stays at an inn in a certain city is dying one after another, and he is requested to exterminate the devil who might be the cause ...​
